Name: Avenging Light
Story Background: In the darkest hour, a radiant light pierces through the shadows, bringing hope to the downtrodden.
Ability: Exile target nonland permanent. If it was a creature, you gain life equal to its power.
Appearance Description: The artwork shows a blinding burst of divine light emanating from the heavens, enveloping the target in a joyful, warm glow.
